top_stories.title: Seismic Announces Intent to Merge With Highspot
top_stories.description: Proposed transaction brings together two leading enablement platforms to support the evolving needs of modern revenue organizations Seismic and Highspot today announced they have signed a definitive agreement to merge the companies. The transaction will bring together two leading enablement platforms with a shared vision to reimagine and accelerate performance... The post Seismic Announces Intent to Merge With Highspot first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.content: Proposed transaction brings together two leading enablement platforms to support the evolving needs of modern revenue organizations Seismic and Highspot today announced they have signed a definitive agreement to merge the companies. top_stories.title: How to Build a Matryoshka-Optimized Sentence Embedding Model for Ultra-Fast Retrieval with 64-Dimension Truncation
top_stories.description: In this tutorial, we fine-tune a Sentence-Transformers embedding model using Matryoshka Representation Learning so that the earliest dimensions of the vector carry the most useful semantic signal. We train with MatryoshkaLoss on triplet data and then validate the key promise of MRL by benchmarking retrieval quality after truncating embeddings to 64, 128, and 256 dimensions. […] The post How to Build a Matryoshka-Optimized Sentence Embedding Model for Ultra-Fast Retrieval with 64-Dimension...
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
top_stories.content: In this tutorial, we fine-tune a Sentence-Transformers embedding model using Matryoshka Representation Learning so that the earliest dimensions of the vector carry the most useful semantic signal. We train with MatryoshkaLoss on triplet data and then validate the key promise of MRL by benchmarking retrieval quality after truncating embeddings to 64, 128, and 256 dimensions. top_stories.title: Enhanced storage resiliency with Azure NetApp Files Elastic zone-redundant service
top_stories.description: Data resiliency is no longer optional—it is the foundation that keeps mission‑critical applications running, teams productive, and compliance intact. Organizations must ensure continuous data availability and zero data loss to meet stringent regulatory and audit standards. The post Enhanced storage resiliency with Azure NetApp Files Elastic zone-redundant service appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog.
top_stories.author: Raji Easwaran
top_stories.content: Data resiliency is no longer optional—it is the foundation that keeps mission‑critical applications running, teams productive, and compliance intact. Organizations must ensure continuous data availability and zero data loss to meet stringent regulatory and audit standards. The post Enhanced storage resiliency with Azure NetApp Files Elastic zone-redundant service appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog.

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B MoE model is now available in Amazon SageMaker JumpStart
top_stories.description: Today we’re excited to announce that the NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B model with 3B active parameters is now generally available in the Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model catalog. You can accelerate innovation and deliver tangible business value with Nemotron 3 Nano on Amazon Web Services (AWS) without having to manage model deployment complexities. You can power your generative AI applications with Nemotron capabilities using the managed deployment capabilities offered by SageMaker JumpStart.
top_stories.author: Dan Ferguson
top_stories.content: Today we’re excited to announce that the NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B model with 3B active parameters is now generally available in the Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model catalog. You can accelerate innovation and deliver tangible business value with Nemotron 3 Nano on Amazon Web Services (AWS) without having to manage model deployment complexities. You can power your generative AI applications with Nemotron capabilities using the managed deployment capabilities offered by SageMaker JumpStart.
